labels.label: [option][=value] ...
Options (brief detail)
nn = numeric value | ss = string value

var.name: alter
var.use: alter = alternative to use for single quote character

var.name: base
var.use: base = base directory for storing files (must have a trailing /)

var.name: play
var.use: play = seconds to wait between song playing queries

var.name: quiet
var.use: quiet = enable/disable output to the console

var.name: reduce
var.use: reduce = apply 'alter' option if set to 1

var.name: run
var.use: run = seconds to wait between program running queries

var.name: sleep
var.use: sleep = seconds to wait between song ended queries
